TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlAttributeEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[事件概觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/events-overview-windows-forms.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Events Overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/events-overview-windows-forms.md). 發生事件，只有當您呼叫方法。The event occurs only when you call the method. ## Examples 下列範例會還原序列化的類別，名為`Group`從名為 UnknownAttributes.xml 檔案。The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownAttributes.xml. 每當在類別中，沒有對應成員的檔案中找到的項目是就會發生事件。Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the event occurs. 若要執行範例，將下列 XML 程式碼貼入名為 UnknownAttributes.xml 的檔案。To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownAttributes.xml. ``` MyGroup ``` [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Xml.XmlAttribute Attr { get; }
.property instance class System.Xml.XmlAttribute Attr
Public ReadOnly Property Attr As XmlAttribute
public: property System::Xml::XmlAttribute ^ Attr { System::Xml::XmlAttribute ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得表示未知 XML 屬性的物件。

span.span: Gets an object that represents the unknown XML attribute.

value.span: 表示未知 XML 屬性的 。

span.span: An that represents the unknown XML attribute.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會還原序列化的類別，名為`Group`從名為 UnknownAttributes.xml 檔案。The following example deserializes a class named `Group` from a file named UnknownAttributes.xml. 每當在類別中，沒有對應成員的檔案中找到的項目是就會發生事件。Whenever an element is found in the file that has no corresponding member in the class, the event occurs. 若要執行範例，將下列 XML 程式碼貼入名為 UnknownAttributes.xml 的檔案。To try the example, paste the following XML code into a file named UnknownAttributes.xml. ``` MyGroup ``` [!code-cpp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlSerializer.UnknownAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

.property instance string ExpectedAttributes
Public ReadOnly Property ExpectedAttributes As String
public: property System::String ^ ExpectedAttributes { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得應該在 XML 文件執行個體中之 XML 屬性名稱的逗號分隔清單。

span.span: Gets a comma-delimited list of XML attribute names expected to be in an XML document instance.

value.span: XML 屬性名稱的逗號分隔清單。

span.span: A comma-delimited list of XML attribute names.

value.span: 每個名稱都使用下列格式：:。

span.span: Each name is in the following format: :.

summary.span: 取得未知 XML 屬性的行號。

span.span: Gets the line number of the unknown XML attribute.

value.span: 未知 XML 屬性的行號。

span.span: The line number of the unknown XML attribute.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例會列印所傳回的值方法時方法遇到未知的屬性。The following example prints the value returned by the method when the method encounters an unknown attribute. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributeEventArgs.ObjectBeingDeserialized Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
